name: third-space-vest
description: Third Space Vest haptic device controller and game integration hub
author: Third Space Vest Contributors

scripts.prebuild:electron: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const src=path.join(__dirname,'..','modern-third-space','build','dist','vest-daemon.exe');const dst=path.join(__dirname,'dist','daemon','vest-daemon.exe');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dst),{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(src,dst);console.log('✓ Daemon copied to dist/daemon/');}else{console.error('✗ Daemon not found:',src);process.exit(1);}"
scripts.build:electron: yarn prebuild:electron && yarn build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win --config electron-builder.yml
